title: Italian 2nd Eritrean Division
text:
The Italian 2nd Eritrean Division, also known as the Second Eritrean Division or II Division Indigini (Native), was an Italian <a href="Infantry">Infantry</a> <a href="Division%20%28military%29">division</a> used in the <a href="Second%20Italo-Abyssinian%20War">Second Italo-Abyssinian War</a> in 1935. It was formed from the <a href="Eritrean%20Ascari">Eritrean Ascari</a> of the Battalion indigeni (Native Battalions) who provided the regular colonial forces of Italian <a href="Eritrea">Eritrea</a>.
During the <a href="Battle%20of%20Maychew">Battle of Maychew</a> the Division took heavy losses against attacks from the elite Ethiopian <a href="Kebur%20Zabagna">Imperial Guard</a>.
Organization.
2nd Natives Division - Gen. <a href="Achille%20Vaccarisi">Achille Vaccarisi</a> 
Note:
